column6: "SATURDAY NIGHT FEVER" concludes as a whole new era for the Marvel Universe begins! Excalibur's mission is called into doubt when the truth about one of their members is revealed to the citizens of Genosha!
column8: | inker:Greg Adams | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Transparency Digital | penciller (cover):Aaron Lopresti | letterer:Tom Orzechowski
